content:
FYI, we've moved the discussion on the Connectathon Terminology Services Track to the connectathon mgmt stream here (with a link to the prior discussions on the implmenters stream): https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/connectathon.20mgmt/subject/Connectathon.20Terminology.20Services.20Track
Questions and issues that are mostly specific to the use of FHIR terminology services in the Connectathons should likely be posted there, and other FHIR terminology topics should continue to be posted here in the terminology stream.
